item.title: Billy Moll - Moonlight On The Colorado
item.description:
Moonlight on the River
Colorado
How I wish that I
were there with you
As I sit and find
each lonely shadow
Takes me back to days
that we once knew
We were to wed in
harvest time you said
That’s why
I’m longing for you
When it’s moonlight
on the Colorado
I wonder if you’re
waiting for me too-
